Module C195JavaFXProject
Package controller

Class AddContactController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AddContactController
  • public class AddContactController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the add contact window. This class and associated window are invoked when the 'New' button is pressed for a contact.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Contacts> contacts)
        This method initializes the add contact window. This method ensures the add button will remain disabled until all information is filled in. The method also sets the list of contacts for the form to use when adding a new contact. Lambda: I implemented lambda expressions within both of the text property change listening methods. This allowed for fewer lines of code.
        Parameters:
        contacts - List of contacts within the database

      • handleAddContact

        private void handleAddContact()
        This method is invoked when the user presses the 'Add' button on the form and handles adding a contact to the database. Once the new contact is successfully added to the database, the method closes the form.

      • handleCancel

        private void handleCancel()
        This method is invoked when the user presses the 'Cancel' button on the form and handles closing down the window. Before the window is closed, the user is alerted to confirm if they want to close the window or not.
